name: 李曉祺
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction & course administration.
Week 2-9: Invited talks.
Week 10-18: Student presentations.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
